description: This file defines a RecyclerView adapter (NotesListAdapter) for displaying a list of notes in an Android application. It manages the binding of note data to the item view layout, handles click and delete actions, and implements differential updates for efficient rendering.

classes.name: NotesListAdapter
classes.description: RecyclerView ListAdapter for displaying notes with functionality for click and delete actions.

methods.name: Diff
methods.description: DiffUtil.ItemCallback implementation for calculating list differences.

methods.name: VH
methods.description: ViewHolder class binding note data to item view.

methods.name: onCreateViewHolder
methods.description: Creates and initializes view holder for a note item.

methods.name: onBindViewHolder
methods.description: Binds note data to the view holder.

methods.name: bind
methods.description: Binds individual note data to the UI components within the view holder.
